scenes.background: Monica, Bob, and you continue discussing celebration ideas.
scenes.description: Bob leans back and says, 'I think the outdoor activity will be too tiring for some people.'

options.text: Maybe we can find a compromise that includes some rest breaks.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and proposed a solution, showing good social skill and self-regulation, but empathy and perception were moderate.

options.text: An outdoor activity can be rejuvenating; let's try to make it enjoyable.
options.analysis: You showed confidence in the idea, displaying good perception and motivation, but empathy was lower.

options.text: Maybe an indoor activity would be more suitable for everyone.
options.analysis: You showed empathy by acknowledging the concern, but self-regulation and social skill were moderate.
